_aLatestUpdates._sText:
Update 2 (18 Aug 2023)

- Redesigned construction site stair ramp part. (should fix major skip for normal runs, TASsers gonna TAS)

- Redesigned some of the rooftops so they cannot be used to skip the entire map.

- Raised teleport triggers wherever possible to stop players from skipping past them.

- Made the rocky KZ part past the tunnels slightly easier due to popular request.

- Fixed another major skip by jumping on a skybox brush.

- Increased the size of the start reset trigger so players can't skip it when starting the timer depending on the timer zone size. (fixes the biggest skip of em all :D)

- Marked starts and ends with timer triggers.

- Very minor visual changes and fixes.

- Removed a debug terrorist spawnpoint.

_sText:
From wilderness to early morning town.


A map that I had been working on and off for the past 2 years. The map has a longjump room, a bonus and a secret.

Start and end zones are marked. HDR+Bloom recommended.

Bad framerate?

Enable multicore rendering (mat_queue_mode -1). This will improve rendering times, specifically static prop rendering. I did what I could to optimize the map and had to halt adding more detail because of this reason.

EDITS


18 Aug 2023 - Update 2 (u2) Small gameplay changes & a lot of skip fixes. See changelog.
25 Dec 2016 - Update 1 (u1) Slight changes to make it easier.
